tooltip.sleep.change.camera.pos: Enables or disables the adjusted camera position when laying in bed. (Default: true)
tooltip.sleep.sleep.button.height: Adjusts the height of the 'Leave Bed' button when laying in bed. (Default: 30)
tooltip.sleep.allow.day.sleep: Enables or disables the player's ability to sleep during the day. (Default: true)
tooltip.sleep.grant.buffs: Enables or disables buffs to players during sleeping. (Default: true)
tooltip.sleep.do.regeneration: Enables or disables health regeneration while sleeping. (Default: true)
tooltip.sleep.change.tick.speed: Enables or disables the increased tick speed while sleeping. (Default: true)
tooltip.sleep.day.skip.speed: Number of ticks the time of day advances per tick while sleeping. (Default: 25.0)
tooltip.sleep.sleep.tick.speed: Multiplier for if the random tick speed should be further increased while sleeping. (Default: 1.0)
tooltip.sleep.well.rested.wait: Time to wait before the 'Well Rested' status is applied during sleep. (Default: 240)
tooltip.sleep.tired.wait: Time to wait before the 'Tired' status is applied during sleep. (Default: 350)
tooltip.sleep.well.rested.length: Duration of the 'Well Rested' status from sleeping. (Default: 2400)
tooltip.sleep.tired.length: Duration of the 'Tired' status from sleeping. (Default: 600)
